title: Ovechkin nets 892nd, now 3 from breaking mark
description: Alex Ovechkin moved three goals away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's NHL record after scoring the 892nd of his career in the Washington Capitals' game at the Carolina Hurricanes on Wednesday night.

title: Hendrickson: Bengals' comments 'disappointing'
description: Defensive end Trey Hendrickson said Wednesday that he's disappointed and confused by Bengals executive Katie Blackburn's recent comments on his contract talks with the team.
author: ESPN

title: 'That was for you, Keelan' - Grealish dedicates goal to late brother
description: An emotional Jack Grealish dedicates his first Premier League goal in almost 16 months to his younger brother Keelan in the 25th anniversary of his death.

title: Raducanu withdraws from GB squad to 'look after body'
description: Emma Raducanu withdraws from the Great Britain squad for next week's Billie Jean King Cup tie in the Netherlands to "look after her body".

title: Premier League to introduce semi-automated offsides this month
description: The Premier League will introduce semi-automated offside technology for the first time on Saturday April 12.

title: Haaland ruled out for up to seven weeks
description: Manchester City forward Erling Haaland could be out for up to seven weeks with an ankle injury, manager Pep Guardiola has confirmed.

title: Garrett Crochet throws a career-high 8 innings as the Red Sox blank the Orioles 3-0
description: Garrett Crochet pitched eight outstanding innings in his first start with his big new contract, and the Boston Red Sox blanked the Baltimore Orioles 3-0 on Wednesday night. Trevor Story homered for the Red Sox, and Kristian Campbell — who also got a sizeable new deal from the Red Sox — had two hits.
author: NOAH TRISTER

title: Alex Ovechkin scores goal No. 892, moves to within 3 of breaking Wayne Gretzky's NHL record of 894
description: Only Gretzky, Ovechkin and Gordie Howe have scored at least 800 goals in NHL history.
author: Sean Leahy
